programme.title: Artists and Models, (1955, Comedy)

programme.title: First Blood, (1982, Action)

programme.title: Rambo: First Blood Part II, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: John Rambo is sent on assignment back to Southeast Asia to uncover evidence of still missing POWs, and ends up with his hands full when he comes up against Vietnamese soldiers still guarding the camps.

programme.title: Rambo III, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Rambo refuses to join his friend and former mentor, Colonel Trautman, on a mission to Afghanistan. The mission fails and Trautman is captured by Russian troops. Now Rambo must infiltrate the Russian fortress to save his only friend.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: When his mentor Admiral James Greer becomes ill, Ryan is appointed acting CIA Director of Intelligence.

programme.title: Point Break, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: An F.B.I. Agent goes undercover to catch a gang of surfers who may be bank robbers.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: When his mentor Admiral James Greer becomes ill, Ryan is appointed acting CIA Director of Intelligence.

programme.title: Walking Tall, (2004, Crime)
programme.desc: Chris Vaughn, a retired soldier who returns to his hometown only to discover the place he grew up is now overrun with crime, drugs and violence. Enlisting the help of his old pal, Chris gets elected Sheriff and fights to clean up his hometown.

programme.desc: On the eve of her 18th birthday, plagued by terrifying nightmares and her father's disappearance, Heather discovers she is not who she thinks she is. The revelation leads her deep into a demonic world that threatens to trap her in Silent Hill forever.

programme.title: Vacancy, (2007, Slashers and Serial Killers)

programme.title: Pandorum, (2009, Sci-Fi Horror)
programme.desc: Two crew members wake up on an abandoned spacecraft without knowing who they are, how long they've been asleep, or their mission. Soon after, they discover they're not alone, and the situation is more horrifying than they ever could have imagined.

programme.title: Succubus, (2024, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: A new father struggling with fatigue, emotional insecurities, and a failing marriage joins a dating app, only to swipe right on what may be an inhuman presence.

programme.title: Mid-Century, (2022, Thriller)
programme.desc: Academy Award Nominee Bruce Dern and Stephen Lang star in this horror tale about a couple renting a vacation home who meet the spirits of the architect and his two wivesâ€”plus their deranged, living son.

programme.title: Escape Room, (2017, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: For a birthday celebration, three couples partake in an ESCAPE ROOM, in which they must work together to solve puzzles in order to escape the roomâ€”but when the game turns deadly, they quickly learn the only winners are the survivors.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Set's Alessi, Part 1
programme.desc: With Joseph and Avdol busy fighting Mariah, Jotaro and Polnareff get concerned about why they haven't shown up yet. As the two search Luxor, Polnareff senses someone following them and confronts the man.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Set's Alessi, Part 2
programme.desc: The power of Alessi's Stand "Set" has turned Polnareff back into a child, leaving him confused and alone. A passerby named Marena takes the boy into her home to help him, but they are followed by Alessi and his terrible powers.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: D'Arby the Gambler, Part 1
programme.desc: After a long journey, Jotaro and his friends finally reach Cairo. They begin asking about the location of DIO's palace and find one man who says he has information, but will only answer if the group can beat him in a game.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: D'Arby the Gambler, Part 2
programme.desc: After losing to D'Arby, Joseph and Polnareff have their souls taken. In order to have their souls returned, Jotaro shows off Star Platinum's powers before beginning a match with D'Arby, warning him that cheating won't work.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Hol Horse and Mondatta, Part 1
programme.desc: Hol Horse arrives at Cairo in order to pursue Jotaro and the others. He has joined forces with another partner and is after the lives of Jotaro and crew once more. What's more, his new partner is none other than Mondatta.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Hol Horse and Mondatta, Part 2
programme.desc: Following Mondatta's prediction, Hol Horse sticks his fingers into Polnareff's nose, but he doesn't know what to do from there. Making matters worse, Jotaro and the others show up in search of Polnareff, forcing Hol Horse into a tough spot.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Guardian of Hell, Pet Shop, Part 1
programme.desc: Jotaro and his friends continue to search for DIO's mansion in Cairo. Following Avdol's advice, they have a beggar look for the mansion and wait. Meanwhile, Iggy, wandering the city alone, is confronted by two large dogs.
programme.sub-title: The Guardian of Hell, Pet Shop, Part 1

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Guardian of Hell, Pet Shop, Part 2
programme.desc: Iggy ends up in a battle to the death in the sewers against Pet Shop, the falcon that guards DIO's mansion. Despite being injured, Iggy runs to the river in an attempt to escape, but he may have underestimated Pet Shop's abilities.
programme.sub-title: The Guardian of Hell, Pet Shop, Part 2

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: D'Arby the Player, Part 1
programme.desc: Though purchased dearly with Iggy's injury, Jotaro and his group finally have the location of DIO's palace. Waiting for them where they find the butler, Darby Younger, brother of the gambler they previously defeated.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: D'Arby the Player, Part 2
programme.desc: The battle for souls with D'Arby continues. Kakyoin challenges D'Arby to a racing game but ends up losing both the race and his soul. Before Joseph really has time to react, Jotaro picks the next game.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Miasma of the Void, Cool Ice, Part 1
programme.desc: The baseball game with D'Arby continues within DIO's mansion. For some reason, Jotaro starts telling D'Arby what pitches he'll be throwing. D'Arby finds Jotaro's actions strange, but still believes he has the upper hand because of his Stand's abilities.
programme.sub-title: The Miasma of the Void, Cool Ice, Part 1

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Miasma of the Void, Cool Ice, Part 2
programme.desc: After a long, hard journey, the group is suddenly faced with saying goodbye to a friend. Polnareff can't control his emotions and starts brandishing his sword toward an unseen enemy with very little success.
programme.sub-title: The Miasma of the Void, Cool Ice, Part 2

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Miasma of the Void, Cool Ice, Part 3
programme.desc: Polnareff is pushed to his limits by Cool Ice's merciless attacks. As he awaits death, the dying Iggy manages to save him at the last minute. Polnareff then stabs Cool Ice in the head. Despite showing resilience to the attacks so far.
programme.sub-title: The Miasma of the Void, Cool Ice, Part 3

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: DIO's World, Part 1
programme.desc: Polnareff finally comes face-to-face with DIO. Despite Polnareff's hostility, DIO offers to forgive him and allow the Frenchman to join his side again. Polnareff refuses, but for some reason, he cannot get any closer to DIO.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: DIO's World, Part 2
programme.desc: As night falls, the battle expands to encompass the whole city of Cairo. Amidst the melee, Kakyoin says he has a way to figure out DIO's Stand ability.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: DIO's World, Part 3
programme.desc: Thanks to Kakyoin, Joseph is able to figure out that DIO's Stand, "The World," has the power to stop time, but is quickly defeated by DIO. Jotaro then attacks The World with Star Platinum but is no match for DIO's power.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: With help from Polnareff as well as putting his own life on the line, Jotaro is finally able to land a blow on DIO. Finding the shriveled body of Joseph Joestar, Jotaro becomes enraged and wages his final, desperate battle with DIO!

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn 2: Texas Blood Money, (1999, Vampires)
programme.desc: When a gang of bank robbers makes a run for the border, they wander into the wrong bar and mess with the wrong vampires. It's kill-or-be-killed in the ultimate battle to stop these evil creatures and save their own lives!

programme.title: Stephen King's Graveyard Shift, (1990, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: When a mill is reopened, several employees meet their deaths. The killings all occur between 11 p.m. and 7 a.m. the Graveyard Shift. Soon, the workers find a maze of tunnels leading to the cemetery and the horror that comes alive at night.

programme.title: Carrie, (2002, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Angela Bettis stars in this adaptation of Stephen King's classic tale of horror. Carrie White has been cursed with the power of telekinesis and when her tormenters commit an act of unforgivable humiliation, they'll soon learn a deadly lesson.

programme.title: The Faculty, (1998, Horror)
programme.desc: A group of small-town high school students discovers their teachers are under the control of mind-controlling alien parasites. From a smart script by Kevin Williamson (SCREAM), and directed by action-expert Robert Rodriguez (FROM DUSK TO DAWN).

programme.title: May, (2003, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc:
May grew up as a lonely oddball whose only friend was a perfectly kept doll. When she moves to L.A., she takes up with a handsome filmmaker and then an alluring lesbian, but every connection she makes turns out deadly.
Rated R

programme.title: Cujo, (1983, Horror Classics)
programme.desc: While Donna and Vic Trenton struggle to save their rocky marriage, their son Tad befriends the loveable 200-lb St. Bernard who belongs to their mechanic.

programme.title: Children Of The Corn: Genesis, (2011, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: An update of the horror classic that follows a couple who take a cross-country road trip to work out their marital issues and end up falling victim to a cult of killer children in an abandoned Nebraska town.

programme.title: Children Of The Corn: Runaway, (2018, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: An evil cult of children who kill, stalks a woman and her son.

programme.title: The Faculty, (1998, Horror)
programme.desc: A group of small-town high school students discovers their teachers are under the control of mind-controlling alien parasites. From a smart script by Kevin Williamson (SCREAM), and directed by action-expert Robert Rodriguez (FROM DUSK TO DAWN).

programme.title: The Dark Half, (1993, Thriller)
programme.desc: A writer undergoes an operation that reveals a twin in his brain. He begins a double writing life, using a pseudonym for his disreputable best-sellers. When the pseudonym discovers he is to be eradicated, he goes on a murderous rampage.

programme.title: Robocop, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: Detroit in the near future. A cop who dies in the line of duty is transformed into a crime-fighting cyborg by the corporation which now runs the police department. The only hitch: this "perfect" cop still seeks revenge on the creeps who mutilated him.

programme.title: Invasion U.S.A., (1985, Action)
programme.desc: An army of terrorist mercenaries led by Soviet agent Rostov catches America unprepared and makes it a war zone from sea to shining sea. Only one man can stem the rising tide of violence: retired agent and martial arts expert Matt Hunter.

programme.title: Missing In Action, (1984, Military & War Action)

programme.desc: Chuck Norris returns as James Braddock in this action-packed prequel to the original hit film. As war rages in Vietnam, Braddock and his men are captured and imprisoned. With fists and sheer courage, he must become an army of one to save his men.

programme.title: Braddock: Missing In Action III, (1988, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: When Colonel James Braddock (Chuck Norris, "Missing in Action") is told that his wife and 12-year-old son are still alive in Communist Vietnam, he mounts a one-man assault to free themâ€¦armed with the latest high-tech firepower, of course!

programme.title: First Blood, (1982, Action)
programme.desc: A soft-spoken Vietnam vet drifts into a small town looking for no trouble, but finds it in the form of a psychotic local sheriff who finds pleasure in hating him for no reason.

programme.title: Rambo: First Blood Part II, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: John Rambo is sent on assignment back to Southeast Asia to uncover evidence of still missing POWs, and ends up with his hands full when he comes up against Vietnamese soldiers still guarding the camps.

programme.desc: Rambo refuses to join his friend and former mentor, Colonel Trautman, on a mission to Afghanistan. The mission fails and Trautman is captured by Russian troops. Now Rambo must infiltrate the Russian fortress to save his only friend.

programme.title: First Blood, (1982, Action)
programme.desc: A soft-spoken Vietnam vet drifts into a small town looking for no trouble, but finds it in the form of a psychotic local sheriff who finds pleasure in hating him for no reason.

programme.title: The First Wives Club, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: Join the Club - The First Wives Club, the good-time battle-of-the-sexes satire sparked by snappy one-liners, great physical-comedy gags and three unforgettable stars in top form, Bette Midler, Goldie Hawn and Diane Keaton.

programme.title: The Out-of-Towners (1999), (1998, Comedy)
programme.desc: A Neil Simon comedy that follows a couple's mishaps as they travel to New York for a job interview. A series of comedic disasters follow that might make one think twice before visiting the Big Apple.

programme.title: Forces of Nature, (1999, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ben is trying to get to Savannah for his wedding. A seagull flies into the engine as his plane is taking off. All later flights are canceled because of an approaching hurricane, so he hitches a ride in with an attractive woman named Sara.

programme.title: Running Scared, (2005, Drama)

programme.title: Pulp Fiction, (1994, Thriller)
programme.desc: Writer-director Quentin Tarantino delivers an iconic cast of characters in PULP FICTION, a wildly entertaining tale of violence and redemption. John Travolta, Samuel L. Jackson, Uma Thurman, and Bruce Willis star in this pop culture phenomenon.

programme.title: Double Jeopardy, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: Libby Parsons, who discovers that the husband sheâ€™s convicted of murdering staged his own â€œdeathâ€ and framed her for the crime. Released on parole, she skips town to find himâ€“and that puts parole officer Travis Lehman on her trail.

programme.title: State of Grace, (1990, Crime)
programme.desc: In this neo-noir crime film, an undercover cop (Sean Penn) comes back to his old neighborhood in New York City's Hell's Kitchen to bring down the Irish Mafia, which is now led by two of his childhood friends (Gary Oldman and Ed Harris).

programme.title: The Good, The Bad And The Ugly, (1967, Western)

programme.title: A Most Violent Year, (2014, Crime)

programme.title: American Honey, (2016, Drama)

programme.title: Barely Lethal, (2015, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Seeking a normal adolescence, a special-operations agent (Hailee Steinfeld) fakes her own death and enrolls in high school as an exchange student.

programme.title: C'mon C'mon, (2021, Drama)
programme.desc: Johnny and his young nephew forge a tenuous but transformational relationship when they are unexpectedly thrown together in this delicate and deeply moving story about the connections between adults and children, the past and the future.

programme.title: Dark Places, (2015, Thriller)
programme.desc: A woman who survived the brutal killing of her family as a child is forced to confront the events of that day with the help of a secret society obsessed with solving notorious crimes.

programme.title: Hot Summer Nights, (2018, Crime)

programme.title: Laggies, (2014, Drama)
programme.desc: A woman (Keira Knightley) stuck in permanent adolescence lies to her fiancÃ© about going on a retreat and spends the time hanging out with teenagers (Chloe Grace Moretz) instead. A comedy about acting your age and other adult decisions.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: Africa's the place where Ace is on the case, setting out to rescue an animal he loathes - a bat! If you're ready to laugh like a pack of hyenas, if you want more fun than an industrial-sized barrel of monkeys, you'll know what to do. Heed the call.

programme.title: So I Married an Axe Murderer, (1993, Comedy)

programme.title: Sleepy Hollow, (1999, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Johnny Depp is Ichabod Crane, an investigator determined to stop the murderous Headless Horseman.

programme.title: Mary Shelley's Frankenstein, (1994, Frankenstein)
programme.desc: When the brilliant but unorthodox scientist Dr. Victor Frankenstein rejects the artificial man that he has created, the Creature escapes and later swears revenge.

programme.title: The Crying Game, (1992, Thriller)
programme.desc: Unpredictable, unconventional, and unforgettable. This thrilling Oscar-winning hit captivated audiences with its tale of an Irish terrorist who seeks out the girlfriend of a former hostage. From director Neil Jordan (INTERVIEW WITH THE VAMPIRE).

programme.title: In Dreams, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: Claire Cooper's (Annette Bening) peaceful family life takes a chilling turn when a mysterious serial killer (Robert Downey Jr.) invades her seemingly idylic New England town and haunts her dreams with dark clues to his next deadly moves.

programme.title: Tales From The Darkside: The Movie, (1990, Horror Classics)
programme.desc: The Wraparound Story concerns a little boy who spins all the tales to distract a witch who wants to pop him in the oven!

programme.title: Sleepy Hollow, (1999, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Johnny Depp is Ichabod Crane, an investigator determined to stop the murderous Headless Horseman.

programme.title: Thunderbolt and Lightfoot, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood and Jeff Bridges lead a strong supporting cast in this offbeat crime caper about a colorful group of bank robbers determined to break into the fortress-like Montana Armored Depository.

programme.title: The Bad News Bears, (1976, Comedy)
programme.desc: A major surprise as one of 1976's top-grossing films. THE BAD NEWS BEARS is a movie about children that is refreshing, utterly believable, and quite cleverly funny.

programme.title: Bad News Bears in Breaking Training, (1977, Comedy)
programme.desc: The story picks up the Bears career a year after their infamous second-place finish in the North Valley League. Faced with a chance to play the Houston Toros for a shot at the Japanese champs, they devise a way to get Texas to play at the famed Astrodome.

programme.title: Bad News Bears Go To Japan, (1978, Comedy)
programme.desc: Caught in a clash of cultures and ready to wreak more havoc on Japan than Godzilla, the Bad News Bears are back this time the Bears are spirited off to Tokyo by a slick and sleazy con artist who sees in the team a perfect peg for a get-rich-quick scheme.

programme.title: Monty Python and the Holy Grail, (1975, Comedy)
programme.desc: Grossing the highest box-office of any British film in the US when released in 1975, this "cult classic" comedy from the Monty Python team loosely follows the legend of King Arthur, along with his squire and his Knights of the Round Table.

programme.title: Monty Python's Life of Brian, (1979, Comedy)
programme.desc: A notorious religious satire, the film tells the story of Brian (Graham Chapman), a reluctant would-be messiah who rises to prominence as a result of a series of absurd and truly hilarious circumstances.

programme.title: Monty Python Live at the Hollywood Bowl, (1982, Comedy)
programme.desc: The legendary live show from the Monty Python troupe. Performing many of their greatest sketches from Monty Python's Flying Circus and two Monty Python specials, Monty Python's Fliegender Zirkus, live from the Hollywood Bowl in 1980.

programme.title: The End, (1978, Comedy)
programme.desc: When Sonny (Burt Reynolds) is diagnosed with a fatal disease, he swallows a bottle of pills to end it all! Instead, he ends up in a loony bin beside the demented Marlon (Dom DeLuise) who is eager to help Sonny succeed...one madcap attempt at a time!

programme.title: The Gambler, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: James Caan portrays a compulsive gambler who can't quit or win. He falls into debt to the mob for $40,000 but seems to relish the thrill of gambling against the long shot.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi vows to overthrow Pegasus for the sake of his Grandpa. Tristan leads an exploration party to uncover Pegasus's secrets. While Joey sleeps, Bandit Keith steals from him the card that permits his entry in the final battle!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Under Pegasus's glare, Yugi is distracted from his duel with Mai. After making foolish errors and allowing Mai to gain a huge advantage with her Harpie's Pet Dragon, will Yugi gather his focus or succumb to the pressure?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai has rebounded from her previous loss to Joey to become a better duelist. Has Yugi learned from his loss to Kaiba, or is the emotional defeat still weighing on his heart? The answer is in the cards!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey searches for the card that permits him to enter the final battle, not realizing Bandit Keith has stolen it. As he struggles to accept the fact that Serenity will be blind forever, he receives help from a new friend!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Bandit Keith's Machine deck forces Joey to take the defensive, Joey mimics Keith's battle strategy to metalize his Red-Eyes Black Dragon! Is victory assured, or does the cheater Bandit Keith literally have one last card up his sleeve?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey challenges Yugi for the right to face Pegasus. In a battle between friends, a fierce match ensues between the two people who know each other's strategies and cards.

programme.desc: Yugi is shocked as Joey uses the Time Wizard card on him. It's the very same card Yugi gave Joey as a sign of friendship!
programme.sub-title: Best of Friends Best of Duelists, Part 2

programme.desc: Yugi prepares for the ultimate battle against Pegasus with the souls of Grandpa, Kaiba, and Mokuba on the line.
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus punishes Yugi using the same Toon Deck and mind-reading abilities he used on Kaiba. As Pegasus turns Yugi's monsters against him, Yugi loses the will to battle. Will Pegasus capture Yugi's soul into a card, just like Kaiba?
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi has found a counter to Pegasus's mind-reading ability: Yugi switches back and forth between his two souls! Yugi is able to destroy Pegasus's Toon World, but the duel has just only begun. The next level of the deadly Shadow Game is about to start!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 3

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi crumples under the power of the Shadow Game. His friends yell desperate encouragement, but their voices cannot penetrate the sphere of darkness. Yugi's chance at victory is slipping away, as is his life!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 4

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi meets a mysterious Egyptian named Shadi who enters Yugi's mind with the Millennium Key. What are these Millennium Items, and do they hold the answer to the mystery behind the Shadow Games?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends return from the Duelist Kingdom only to meet a young girl named Rebecca who demands that Grandpa return Blue-Eyes White Dragon to her.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Rebecca mistakenly believes that Grandpa stole the Blue-Eyes White Dragon from her grandfather. Yugi must defend the Blue-Eyes White Dragon to teach her that it's not the power of the cards, but the heart that's in them that counts.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The two-faced Board of Directors of Kaiba Corporation trap Kaiba inside a virtual reality game. Mokuba recruits Yugi and Joey to free Kaiba from this ultimate game where losing equals death!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The quest for Kaiba continues with a little help fromâ€¦ Mai? But can YUGI and friends adapt to a virtual world where the rules and strategies keep changing every step of the way?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends rescue Kaiba, but they are still stuck in the game! The only exit is past a Five-Headed Dragon, but in the difficult duel, Joey, Mokuba, and Mailose all their life points!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Duke Devlin defeats Joey and humiliates him in public, forcing Yugi to challenge Duke to a duel. However, this will not be a Duel Monsters duel, but a new game named Dungeon Dice Monsters!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In exchange for Joey's freedom, Yugi agrees to give up Duel Monsters forever if he loses. Unfamiliar with the rules, Yugi gets off to a rough start.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi uses his innate gaming skills to turn the tables on Duke, but Duke has one more rule to mention: All creatures take up territory on the grid-like board. With no room to summon any new monsters, Yugi's position is helpless!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Duke's all-powerful Orogoth The Relentless dices Yugi's entire cadre of monsters into shreds, Yugi only has one turn left before he loses all his heart points!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: An arcane fortune teller steals the Millennium Puzzle and Yugi must defeat him in a duel to win it back.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The mysterious menace controlling Bandit Keith shatters the Millennium Puzzle into pieces before setting the dueling arena ablaze. Can Yugi put the Millennium Puzzle back together and save the spirit before the entire room is engulfed in flames?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origin of Duel Monsters is revealed. Using the magic of the Millennium Necklace, Egyptian historian Ishizu Ishtar shows Kaiba how Duel Monsters was played millenniums ago.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The spirit of the Millennium Puzzle realizes that his memories of ancient Egypt have faded, but Tea helps him uncover the mysteries of his past.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi learns that he was a powerful Pharaoh who saved the world five thousand years ago, and he must now save the world again.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey is cornered by a group of sinister Rare Hunters who force Joey into a duel. If he loses, the Rare Hunters get his precious Red-Eyes Black Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's time to master new rules and monsters; let the Battle City Tournament commence! In the first duel of the tournament, Yugi challenges the Rare Hunter to win back Joey's Red-Eyes Black Dragon.
programme.sub-title: Yugi Vs. Rare Hunter Part 1 - Battle City Begins

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi figures out the Rare Hunter's strategy to summon the almighty Exodia, but it's too late to stop him. The Rare Hunter already has four pieces of Exodia in his hand, and the fifth and final piece is on top of his deck.
programme.sub-title: Yugi Vs. Rare Hunter Part 2 - Up Against Exodia

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The psychic duelist Espa Roba defeats Rex Raptor as easy as a chumpasaurus, and Joey's next on his hit list. What chance does Joey have when Espa Roba has the telepathic ability to read all the cards in Joey's hand?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey discovers that Espa Roba's extrasensory perception was a hoax, that he's not yet free from Espa's mental manipulations.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The magician duelist Arkana transports Yugi to the world's most lethal dueling arena where the loser gets sent to the Shadow Realm. Yugi must win this duel or he'll lose much more than his Dark Magician.

programme.title: Luffy and Zoro have been stalled by Hawkins but their fortune looks bright as they are guided by a woman who Zoro had saved. She leads them to a teahouse and to an herbal remedy for the river poison.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Defeat is Inevitable! The Strawman's Fierce Attack!

programme.title: Otama's life is saved by Otsuru at her teahouse. The proud Otama finds it hard to take more kindness. The group learns of the Okobore Town - living on the cast-offs of the officials! Then, suddenly, they were attacked by the Shogun's men!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Greatest Day of My Life! Otama and Her Sweet Red-bean Soup!

programme.title: Otama has been kidnapped by the Gifters! She is taken to a flourishing town called Bakura Town where a creepy-looking Headliner was expecting her. Luffy and Zoro rush to rescue her along with a samurai, Okiku!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Charging into the Enemy's Territory! Bakura Town - Where Officials Thrive!

programme.title: As Luffy, Zoro, and Okiku bounce through Bakura Town on Komachiyo's back, a sumo wrestler comes flying towards them! Interested, they go down to watch sumo but the undefeated yokozuna Urashima has been expecting Okiku there.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Yokozuna Appears! The Invincible Urashima Goes After Okiku!

programme.title: Luffy challenges Urashima, the strongest yokozuna in the Land of Wano, to a sumo match! Urashima even uses illegal moves to beat Luffy at any cost! Meanwhile, Holdem tells Otama that he knows she committed a crime and he has to punish her for it.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Climactic Sumo Battle! Straw Hat vs. the Strongest Ever Yokozuna!

programme.title: After sending the yokozuna Urashima flying, Luffy and his clan continue their search for Bakura Town's boss to save Otama! They finally find the boss, Holdem, one of the Beast Pirates' Headliners.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Rages! Rescue Otama from Danger!

programme.title: Facing Holdem who is holding Otama as hostage, Luffy prepares for a fight but Okiku tries to stop him by sharing who is really ruling the region. Meanwhile, Basil Hawkins is confronted by a mysterious figure.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Taking Back Otama! A Fierce Fight Against Holdem!

programme.title: Taking down Holdem, Luffy rescues Otama and tries to catch up to Zoro and Okiku who stole the food treasure ship and started a mad dash to get out of the town!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Duel! The Magician and the Surgeon of Death!

programme.title: This is a story of Luffy in an alternate reality. While sailing on the sea by himself, a strange bird crashes into his small boat. He looks up to find a giant ship where a girl named Ann has been captured. It seems like the bird belongs to her.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Zoro and the others dash out of BakuraTown on the treasure ship filled with food! Luffy catches up to them bringing ahuge bucket of fresh water! Then, they distribute the food and the water to thepeople of Okobore Town who were thirsty and hungry.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Coming of the Treasure Ship! LuffytaroReturns the Favor!

programme.title: Luffy arrives at the ruins of Oden Castle following Law and finds the graves of his friends, Kin'emon and the others. As Law starts telling the already-stunned Luffy about the creepy story of Kin'emon's ghost, Luffy sees it coming towards him!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Mysterious Grave Markers! A Reunion at the Ruins of Oden Castle!

programme.title: Kin'emon tells Luffy and the others about how Kozuki Oden made Kuri into a peaceful region and became its Daimyo. However, he was set up by Kaido and Kurozumi Orochi and executed.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Legendary Samurai! The Man Who Roger Admired!

programme.title: Kin'emon and the others crossed through time by the power of Kozuki Toki, Momonosuke's mother, and arrived at the Land of Wano 20 years later, a totally different country before their eyes.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Bringing Down the Emperor of the Sea! A Secret Raid Operation Begins!

programme.title: Ashura Doji, one of the allies Kin'emon wants to search for, has become the head of a thieves brigade and they now raid Okobore Town taking away the food that Luffy gave to the people.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Strongest Man in the World! Shutenmaru, the Thieves Brigade Chief!

programme.title: The drunken Kaido flies above Okobore Town in his dragon form and threatens Shutenmaru and all the people in the town. Luffy, Law, Kin'emon, and Okiku start running towards the town to rescue them.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Everyone is Annihilated! Kaido's Furious Blast Breath!

programme.title: After Luffy sees Kaido shattering the ruins of Oden Castle where he left his friends, he becomes enraged and attacks Kaido! Soon after, he finds out Kaido even assaulted Otama who was riding on Speed's back to her home.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Finally Clashing! The Ferocious Luffy vs. Kaido!

programme.title: An infuriated Luffy strikes blow after blow on the drunken Kaido. When he activates Gear Four Bounce-Man and launches even more powerful attacks, Kaido fights back and knocks him out with just one blow.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Destructive! One Shot, One Kill â€“ Thunder Bagua!

programme.title: Luffy gets beaten by Kaido and is sent to a great mine where prisoners are made to work in forced labor. There, he finds an unexpected reunion. Meanwhile, Okiku is rushing to the ruins of Oden Castle.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Living Hell! Luffy, Humiliated in the Great Mine!

programme.title: On Gloom Island in the Grand Line, Perona finds out that her captain, Gecko Moria, is alive and she is about to leave Dracule Mihawk who let her stay there for the last two years. Meanwhile,
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Holyland in Tumult! Emperor of the Sea Blackbeard Cackles!

programme.title: Dogstorm fights against Shutenmaru to ally with him for their operation but Shutenmaru still rejects their call.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: It's On! The Special Operation to Bring Down Kaido!

programme.title: In the Excavation Labor Camp, Luffy competes against Kid by hauling stones for food and they both get tons of it. However, Dobon, a vice warden, becomes furious when he finds out all their provisions are gone, and gives Luffy and Kid a new sentence.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Rampage! The Prisoners â€“ Luffy and Kid!

programme.title: Sanji's Special Soba becomes very popular but some gang members come to disturb his business and knock over a customer's bowl. Infuriated, Sanji takes them down and gives the customer, a little girl named Toko.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Great Sensation! Sanji's Special Soba!

programme.title: Wano's top courtesan Komurasaki is in procession and slowly makes her way to Orochi Palace. There is a crowd of people on the street as well as Sanji and the others. While everyone is fascinated by her, some seeking vengeance get in the Oiran's way.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luxurious and Gorgeous! Wano's Most Beautiful Woman â€“ Komurasaki!

programme.title: Zoro who has been wandering around the Land of Wano since he got separated from his friends meets a sycophant named Tonoyasu. Tonoyasu paid for Zoro's sushi and to pay him back, Zoro gambles at dice.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Tale of Chivalry! Zoro and Tonoyasu's Little Trip!

programme.title: Zoro is taken to the sycophant Tonoyasu's poor hometown, Ebisu Town where people laugh away their misfortune.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A State of Emergency! Big Mom Closes in!

programme.title: As the Big Mom Pirates approach the Land of Wano, Kaido's subordinates led by King and Queen try to get rid of them.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Capital in an Uproar! Another Assassin Targets Sanji!

programme.title: Sanji faces Page One, a Headliner of the Animal Kingdom Pirates, who questions the soba cook's true identity. Sanji uses Germa's device for the first time and transforms himself into Stealth Black while dubbing himself Soba Mask.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: While the banquet grows livelier at Orochi's Castle, Robin is confronted by his ninja force called Oniwabanshu. In the meanwhile in Kuri, Chopper, Tama, and Momonosuke train themselves preparing for the incoming battle.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Desperate Situation! Orochi's Menacing Oniwabanshu!

programme.title: At the banquet, the Shogun Orochi starts to talk about his late old enemy which bores the attendees. Suddenly, the Oiran's child attendant Toko bursts with laughter and won't stop. Orochi becomes furious and attacks her.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Pandemonium! The Monster Snake, Shogun Orochi!

programme.title: In order to save her child attendant Toko, the top Oiran Komurasaki stands up to the Shogun Orochi, but the yakuza boss Kyoshiro interrupts and does something that no one expected.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Flower Falls! The Final Moment of the Most Beautiful Woman in the Land of Wano!

programme.title: Nami, Robin, and the others got away from Oden's Castle and now discuss what they have found out about the enemy so far. Meanwhile, Chopper's group sets off to rescue Luffy from the Excavation Labor Camp.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Bond Between Prisoners! Luffy and Old Man Hyo!

programme.sub-title: A Lead Performer! Queen the Plague Emerges!

programme.desc: One Piece

programme.desc: Look who is flying above New York; it's Superman! All he does is fly around, but the town is in a panic because of his performance. In the meantime, a lot of banks get robbed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin steals a statue called the Stone Child from the Metropolitan Art Museum; he and Fujiko make their getaway in a Cessna, but they crash at the Bermuda Triangle. They encounter a ghost ship at this grave of many ships and planes.
programme.sub-title: From the Ghost Ship with Love

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin III learns that his grandfather ArsÃ¨ne Lupin's secret treasures are buried in his grave. Lupin learns of its location with Fujiko's microfilm.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen are surrounded, as usual, as they are trying to escape after a jewelry theft. But somebody shoots at Zenigata and hits him dead on. Lupin learns of the even the next morning in the papers, and Fujiko and Goemon get implicated.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The prime minister of the Duchy of Blanco has a one-of-a-kind gold coin of Hannibal hidden in his chest; well, Lupin and crew are after it. Amidst their scheming, Jigen is challenged to a duel with a man named Stoneman.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The prime minister of France has run up a ridiculous tab with Maxim of Paris, and orders the Louvre Museum proprietor to sell a painting to cover his bill. But the proprietor doesn't want to let it go, and takes the painting out of the museum.
programme.sub-title: The Ultra Operation in the Train

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin recieves a letter about Marie Antoinette's jeweled crown, and sneaks into the palace of Versailles. A young man called Oscar appears, the sender of the letter.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin was told by Fujiko to steal a pistol of the Wilhem family worth 500 million pounds. Meanwhile, a man named Jim Benkei, a giant of a man who's stirred troubled in London, steals Jigen's favorite Magnum ...

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is after the various jewels at the World Fair in Los Angeles. Lupin learns from Fujiko that a man named Harry Satler is also after the jewels, so he decides to go see who this guy is. The man he meets is a wizened old manâ€¦
programme.sub-title: The Wolf Looked at an Angel!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Pestered by Fujiko, Lupin has to steal a golden bed that was originally made by Louis XIV for Josephine. He makes a plan with Jigen and Goemon, but the owner of the bed, Morgan, is a formidable opponent who has WWII military experience.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Vivian dreams of becoming a star some day, but her auditions are a bust. She thinks of using Lupin to become famous; she makes Lupin engage in thievery, and informs reporters to be at the site to catch him in the act.
programme.sub-title: A Cat for You! Dried Bonito for Me!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Louis XIV and Marie Antoinette's Hope Diamond has brought much misfortune on its possessors. The diamond is now safeguarded by a maximum security device. Fujiko provokes Lupin to steal that diamond.
programme.sub-title: The Wedding Ring is a Cursed Trap

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and crew go to a hot spring. Lupin and Jigen relax while Goemon trains at the cliffs. A girl manifests to Goemon and captures Goemon's heart. However, the girl is seeking the secret of his sword, for her swordsmith grandfatherâ€¦

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin has to battle a hitman called Tiger. Lupin tries to dodge him, but Tiger is one step ahead of him. Lupin keeps trying to escape him but Tiger is relentless; he has a way of disappearing and appearing at will.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and friends go to have fun at the horse race track, but winning isn't as easy as stealing. Lupin notices two people who are winning big money hand over fist, and gets suspicious.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Catherine rescues Lupin and Jigen, who are pursued by Zenigata as usual. She's an old acquaintance of Jigen's, and provokes Jigen to steal a 140-karat diamond from her own mansion.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Wolf and Rose are a cool hitmen duo with the ambition of rising to the top of the hitman business by killing Lupin. They capture Goemon and torture him to confess about Lupin's weaknesses. Lupin learns that Goemon is in danger.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The chief of the police department accused of mismanagement on Lupin's release, hit the prime minister out of anger and was dismissed. Zenigata thinks that Lupin is the only arrest to avenge the chief's death, and starts an operation.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2

programme.sub-title: The Secret of the First Supper

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Mona Lisa never leaves the Louvre Museum. ArsÃ¨ne Lupin tried unsuccessfully to steal her and Lupin III wants her for his collection, however, and fireworks ignite between him and Zenigata in charge of security.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: On New Years Eve, Lupin is after is the Golden Treasure Ship at Mount Horai. It's said that the Seven Lucky Gods conferred this treasure, which is shown in public only once a year when the New Year's bell rings at the belfry of Kohoji Temple.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: As usual, Lupin is tossed to and fro by Fujiko. But a man named Buckingham comes to him and sells him "disguise chewing gum" for 50,000 dollars.
programme.sub-title: The Strategy of the Chewing Gum Disguise

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The island of Rabaul has many remains of Japanese casualties of the Pacific War. It's said that Captain Cook's secret treasure is hidden there, worth 1-billion pounds. Lupin and gang are after this treasure but they get attacked!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and gang break into the Bank of Stockholm but as usual, Fujiko tries to take the money all for herself. Lupin goes after her but she gets injured in an avalanche. She confesses to Lupin about the location of her most precious treasureâ€¦

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and friends search a month for the pirate Kid's treasure, but they are thwarted by an underground organization called the Red Ghost. Knowing something is afoot, Lupin sends Fujiko and Goemon to investigate.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin finds a piece of paper in a silk hat, an heirloom of ArsÃ¨ne Lupin. It's information regarding an opal statue of Venus, and since Lupin figures its ownership is his birthright, he heads to Gregoire's castle.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Zenigata acquires a pie-throwing gun, and is ordered to capture Lupin. Meanwhile, Lupin and Fujiko are discussing Napoleon's treasures. It's said that the key to solving the mystery of their whereabouts lies in a scarf made by Napoleon's assistantâ€¦
programme.sub-title: An Unusual End to an Expedition for Napoleon's Treasure

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The young girl Francoise lives near Lupin; she watches Lupin and Fujiko talking, and falls for him. But her father scolds her and tells her to stay away from thieves, but Francoise devises a plan to approach Lupin anywayâ€¦

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Professor Pancho has devoted his life to solving the problem of food supply. Lupin decides to help them out and invents a rocket that flies on corn fuel, thinking that maybe he and Fujiko will take a trip to the moonâ€¦

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is blackmailed; Fujiko has been kidnapped, and for ransom he must steal a jeweled crown worth 100 million dollars. Lupin and friends head to the museum where their objective lies.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn, (1996, Vampires)
programme.desc: In this thrilling cult classic, two dangerous outlaw brothers head out on a wild crime spree. After kidnapping a father and his two kids, the bad guys head to a seedy Mexican bar for safety but come face to face with blood-sucking vampires.

programme.title: Universal Soldier, (1992, Science fiction)

programme.title: The Crow, (1994, Action)

programme.title: Deep Impact, (1998, Science fiction)
programme.desc: When a couple of young astronomers discover an enormous comet on course to collide with Earth, the countdown to doomsday begins and the human race embarks on the fight for survival.

programme.title: Universal Soldier, (1992, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A woman reporter discovers a Defense Department project to create androids from the bodies of Vietnam soldiers, to be then used as an elite anti-terrorism unit.

programme.title: The Alamo, (1960, War)
programme.desc: John Wayne produces, directs and stars in this retelling of the Alamo, a battle in which 185 men joined together against an army of 7,000. Filmed entirely in Texas, "The Alamo" is a visually stunning and historically accurate celebration of courage.

programme.title: El Dorado, (1966, Drama)

programme.desc: Nicolas Cage and Michael PeÃ±a star as two New York City Port Authority policemen who were trapped in the rubble of September 11, 2001.
